## Home Cooking

| runtime        = 2 reels
| country        = USA
| language       = Silent..English titles
}}
Home Cooking is a 1924 silent short film directed by Herman C. Raymaker and produced by and starring Monty Banks.
A print survives in the Library of Congress collection.Catalog of Holdings The American Film Institute Collection and The United Artists Collection at The Library of Congress (

*Monty Banks
